mapper.select: select id, talent_id, bank_name, open_bank, account_name, bank_card_no, transfer_amount, funds_purpose, application_status, creator_id, gmt_create, regenerator_id, gmt_modified, remark from construction_industry_api.t_talent_transfer where talent_id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.talent_id, t1.bank_name, t1.open_bank, t1.account_name, t1.bank_card_no, t1.transfer_amount, t1.funds_purpose, t1.application_status, t1.creator_id, t1.gmt_create, t1.regenerator_id, t1.gmt_modified, t1.remark, t2.id as id2, t2.talent_transfer_id, t2.status, t2.gmt_create as gmt_create2, t2.creator_id as creator_id2, t2.approval_opinion from construction_industry_api.t_talent_transfer as t1 left join construction_industry_api.t_talent_approval_flow as t2 on t1.id = t2.talent_transfer_id where t1.id = #{id}
